Description:
Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the code block linked in the references

Author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation - Security
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '4697' and (servicefilename re '\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[' and servicefilename re '\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[' and servicefilename re '\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[' and servicefilename re '\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}' and servicefilename re '\\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name' and servicefilename re '\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(' and servicefilename re '\String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference'))
